title: Diploma in HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript
headline: Learn how to use HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to make interactive web pages with this free web programming course.
description: Alison's free online Diploma in HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript certification course will give you in-depth knowledge of how you can use HTML5 to define the content of web pages, CSS3 to specify the layout and style of web pages, and JavaScript to program the behavior of web pages. These sets of skills will be a great boost to your career development as a computer programmer. Learn these languages to create functional and responsive web pages, today!
courseDescription:
This course will first discuss how HTML and CSS structures and styles the content of a web page. You will study the global attributes that can be added to HTML5 elements as well as learn how to create a correctly formatted form using HTML5. You will then study the different types of CSS3 selectors and learn how to apply them to style web pages. The course will also teach you how to embed a video using HTML5 as well as how to add video controls to a video.

Next, you will learn about JavaScript variables and programming concepts such as declaring variables using the var keyword and naming JavaScript variables using identifiers. The course will then discuss the most important types of JavaScript loops and their correct syntax as well as the concept of the Document Object Model. You will also take a deep look at jQuery - the most popular JavaScript library in use today - and learn how it can add greater functionality to your web pages.

Web development skills are highly valuable in the modern economy. Thanks to HTML5 and CSS3, developers are able to structure content and present it on the web in such a way that is easy to read and appealing to users. This Diploma in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript online course will teach you the most essential web technologies you need in order to make such high quality web pages. So why wait? Check out the course today, and learn some really valuable and practical skills in no time.
